scene.name: intro
scene.line: Oh, good. I thought you'd left. People can be so impatient; you never know.

Well, I have you meeting with Lula Chamberlain. She's a senior clerk and doesn't usually handle the ingestion process, but she's the only one with room on her plate this evening. My schedule says she's on the fifth floor, reviewing some diagrams.
The elevator is just back to the left there. Fifth floor.
